title: Equals. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2016)
description:
In theaters: Coming Soon

Description:

In this gripping and emotional sci-fi romance from acclaimed director Drake Doremus (Like Crazy), Kristen Stewart and Nicholas Hoult star as Nia and Silas, two young people who somehow manage to fall in love in an oppressive futuristic society where human emotions have been eradicated. They try to keep their relationship a secret, but as their leaders become increasingly suspicious, they realize they must ultimately make a choice between going back to the life they had always known or act on their passionate and deep feelings for one other and attempt a risky plan of escape.

Director: Drake Doremus

Writers: Nathan Parker

Actors: Kristen Stewart, Nicholas Hoult, Guy Pearce, Bel Powley, Jacki Weaver, Kate Lyn Sheil, Claudia Kim, David Selby

Genre: Science Fiction, Romance

Run Time: 1 hour 41 minutes
